title: tillaikku vazhi kATTuvIr
sahitya:
tillaikku vazhi kATTuvIr terinda pErgaL dEshamellAm shuTri vEsaTrayarndEn ayyA


anupallavi

  ellaiyillA ulagil sholla muDiyAda tollaigaL poruttu nAn sutantirattai nADinEn


caraNam    jnAnak-kuruDan ayyE enakkoru nAdiyillai anAdi En enak-kETpAn oruvan avan anbE
enakkoru tuNaiyighattil dInanukk-irangiDuvIr ennai nalla dikkilE naDattiDuvI
vAnamudam pOluLLE vandu vand-inittiDum Ananda naTam sheyyum aruT-perumAn vAzhum
